author: James Martin
method: Heat a grill pan over a high heat. Brush the smoked salmon with the oil and grill for 1-2 minutes on each side, or until nicely charred. Serve on top of the radicchio with lemon wedges.
ingredients: 1 piece smoked salmon,  2 tsp vegetable oil,  2 handfuls radicchio, shredded,  lemon wedges, to serve
